ViewDef.Title: Report: ESXi Hosts for CSV Export
ViewDef.Description:
A simple table for export as a CSV file. Used in report only, hence it has no formatting. Just like the rest of the report, it is designed for weekly, not daily nor monthly.
Schedule it to run end of the week, such as Sunday 23:59

ReportDef.Title: VOA - ESXi Hosts CSV Export
ReportDef.Description:
This CSV file is part of VCF Optimization Assessment. It's not a standalone file. Use it together with the other CSV export as each file only covers 1 object.
It's designed for further analysis in a spreadsheet.
To see for the whole environment, run this against vSphere World object. To see specific vCenter or vCenter Data Center, choose the object.
Tailor this large view by removing unnecessary columns.
